snippets.name: WiX with BAL
snippets.description: Root element for bundles with BAL

snippets.name: WiX with VS
snippets.description: Root element with Visual Studio namespace

snippets.name: WiX All Extensions
snippets.description: Root element with all common namespaces

snippets.name: Full Package
snippets.body:
<Package Name="${1:ProductName}"
	Manufacturer="${2:Company}"
	Version="${3:1.0.0}"
	UpgradeCode="${4:PUT-GUID-HERE}"
	Language="1033"
	Compressed="yes"
	InstallerVersion="500"
	Scope="perMachine">

	<MajorUpgrade DowngradeErrorMessage="A newer version is already installed." />
	<MediaTemplate EmbedCab="yes" />

	$0
</Package>

snippets.name: Component with Registry
snippets.body:
<Component Id="${1:ComponentId}" Guid="*">
	<RegistryKey Root="HKLM" Key="${2:Software\\Company\\Product}">
		<RegistryValue Type="string" Name="${3:ValueName}" Value="${4:Value}" KeyPath="yes" />
	</RegistryKey>
</Component>

snippets.name: Shared Component
snippets.body:
<Component Id="${1:ComponentId}" Guid="*" SharedDllRefCount="yes">
	<File Id="${2:FileId}" Source="${3:SourcePath}" KeyPath="yes" />
</Component>

snippets.name: Component with Shortcut
snippets.body:
<Component Id="${1:ShortcutComponent}" Guid="*">
	<Shortcut Id="${2:ApplicationShortcut}" Name="${3:App Name}" Target="[INSTALLFOLDER]${4:app.exe}" WorkingDirectory="INSTALLFOLDER" />
	<RemoveFolder Id="RemoveShortcutFolder" On="uninstall" />
	<RegistryValue Root="HKCU" Key="Software\\${5:Company}\\${3:App Name}" Name="installed" Type="integer" Value="1" KeyPath="yes" />
</Component>

snippets.name: Component with Service
snippets.body:
<Component Id="${1:ServiceComponent}" Guid="*">
	<File Id="${2:ServiceExe}" Source="${3:path\\service.exe}" KeyPath="yes" />
	<ServiceInstall Id="${1:ServiceComponent}" Name="${4:ServiceName}" DisplayName="${5:Display Name}" Start="auto" Type="ownProcess" ErrorControl="normal" />
	<ServiceControl Id="${1:ServiceComponent}Control" Name="${4:ServiceName}" Start="install" Stop="both" Remove="uninstall" Wait="yes" />
</Component>

snippets.name: Component with Environment
snippets.body:
<Component Id="${1:EnvComponent}" Guid="*">
	<Environment Id="${2:EnvId}" Name="${3:PATH}" Value="[INSTALLFOLDER]" Permanent="no" Part="last" Action="set" System="yes" />
	<RegistryValue Root="HKLM" Key="Software\\${4:Company}" Name="EnvSet" Type="integer" Value="1" KeyPath="yes" />
</Component>

snippets.name: Optional Feature
snippets.description: Optional feature not installed by default

snippets.name: Hidden Feature
snippets.description: Feature that is hidden from UI

snippets.name: Nested Feature
snippets.body:
<Feature Id="${1:ParentFeature}" Title="${2:Parent Title}" Level="1">
	<Feature Id="${3:ChildFeature}" Title="${4:Child Title}" Level="1">
		$0
	</Feature>
</Feature>

snippets.name: Secure Property
snippets.description: Property that can be passed to deferred CA

snippets.name: Installed EXE CA
snippets.body: <CustomAction Id="${1:CAId}" FileRef="${2:ExeFileId}" ExeCommand="${3:args}" Execute="deferred" Return="check" Impersonate="no" />

snippets.name: VBScript Custom Action
snippets.body:
<CustomAction Id="${1:CAId}" Script="vbscript" Execute="${2|immediate,deferred|}">
	<![CDATA[
	${0:' VBScript code here}
	]]>
</CustomAction>

snippets.name: JScript Custom Action
snippets.body:
<CustomAction Id="${1:CAId}" Script="jscript" Execute="${2|immediate,deferred|}">
	<![CDATA[
	${0:// JScript code here}
	]]>
</CustomAction>

snippets.name: PowerShell Custom Action
snippets.body:
<CustomAction Id="${1:CAId}" Script="ps1" Execute="${2|immediate,deferred|}">
	<![CDATA[
	${0:# PowerShell code here}
	]]>
</CustomAction>

snippets.name: Deferred CA Pattern
snippets.body:
<CustomAction Id="${1:CAId}_SetData" Property="${1:CAId}" Value="[PROPERTY1];[PROPERTY2]" />
<CustomAction Id="${1:CAId}" BinaryRef="${2:CustomActionDll}" DllEntry="${3:Function}" Execute="deferred" Return="check" Impersonate="no" />

snippets.name: Rollback Custom Action
snippets.body: <CustomAction Id="${1:CAId}" BinaryRef="${2:CustomActionDll}" DllEntry="${3:RollbackFunction}" Execute="rollback" Return="ignore" Impersonate="no" />

snippets.name: Commit Custom Action
snippets.body: <CustomAction Id="${1:CAId}" BinaryRef="${2:CustomActionDll}" DllEntry="${3:CommitFunction}" Execute="commit" Return="check" Impersonate="no" />

snippets.name: Error Custom Action
snippets.body: <CustomAction Id="${1:CAId}" Error="${2:Installation cannot proceed. Error message.}" />

snippets.name: InstallExecuteSequence
snippets.description: Install execute sequence with custom actions

snippets.name: InstallUISequence
snippets.description: Install UI sequence with custom actions

snippets.name: Complete Registry Component
snippets.body:
<Component Id="${1:RegistryComponent}" Guid="*">
	<RegistryKey Root="${2|HKLM,HKCU|}" Key="${3:Software\\Company\\Product}">
		<RegistryValue Type="string" Name="${4:InstallPath}" Value="[INSTALLFOLDER]" KeyPath="yes" />
		<RegistryValue Type="string" Name="${5:Version}" Value="[ProductVersion]" />
	</RegistryKey>
</Component>

snippets.name: Service Install
snippets.body: <ServiceInstall Id="${1:ServiceId}" Name="${2:ServiceName}" DisplayName="${3:Service Display Name}" Description="${4:Service Description}" Start="${5|auto,demand,disabled|}" Type="${6|ownProcess,shareProcess|}" ErrorControl="${7|ignore,normal,critical|}" Account="${8|LocalSystem,LocalService,NetworkService|}" />

snippets.name: Delayed Auto Start Service
snippets.body:
<ServiceInstall Id="${1:ServiceId}" Name="${2:ServiceName}" DisplayName="${3:Service Display Name}" Start="auto" Type="ownProcess" ErrorControl="normal" Account="LocalSystem">
	<ServiceConfig DelayedAutoStart="yes" OnInstall="yes" />
</ServiceInstall>

snippets.name: Service with Custom Account
snippets.body: <ServiceInstall Id="${1:ServiceId}" Name="${2:ServiceName}" DisplayName="${3:Service Display Name}" Start="auto" Type="ownProcess" ErrorControl="normal" Account="[SERVICEACCOUNT]" Password="[SERVICEPASSWORD]" />

snippets.name: Service Control
snippets.body: <ServiceControl Id="${1:ServiceControlId}" Name="${2:ServiceName}" Start="${3|install,uninstall,both|}" Stop="${4|install,uninstall,both|}" Remove="${5|install,uninstall,both|}" Wait="yes" />

snippets.name: Complete Service
snippets.body:
<Component Id="${1:ServiceComponent}" Guid="*">
	<File Id="${2:ServiceExe}" Source="${3:ServicePath}" KeyPath="yes" />
	<ServiceInstall Id="${1:ServiceComponent}" Name="${4:ServiceName}" DisplayName="${5:Display Name}" Start="auto" Type="ownProcess" ErrorControl="normal" Account="LocalSystem" />
	<ServiceControl Id="${1:ServiceComponent}Control" Name="${4:ServiceName}" Start="install" Stop="both" Remove="uninstall" Wait="yes" />
</Component>

snippets.name: Shortcut Element
snippets.body: <Shortcut Id="${1:ShortcutId}" Name="${2:Shortcut Name}" Description="${3:Description}" Target="[${4:INSTALLFOLDER}]${5:app.exe}" WorkingDirectory="${4:INSTALLFOLDER}" />

snippets.name: Advertised Shortcut
snippets.body: <Shortcut Id="${1:ShortcutId}" Name="${2:Shortcut Name}" Description="${3:Description}" Directory="${4:ApplicationProgramsFolder}" Advertise="yes" Icon="${5:ProductIcon}" IconIndex="0" />

snippets.name: Desktop Shortcut
snippets.body: <Shortcut Id="${1:DesktopShortcut}" Name="${2:Shortcut Name}" Directory="DesktopFolder" Target="[INSTALLFOLDER]${3:app.exe}" WorkingDirectory="INSTALLFOLDER" Icon="${4:ProductIcon}" />

snippets.name: Shortcut with Arguments
snippets.body: <Shortcut Id="${1:ShortcutId}" Name="${2:Shortcut Name}" Target="[INSTALLFOLDER]${3:app.exe}" Arguments="${4:--arg value}" WorkingDirectory="INSTALLFOLDER" />

snippets.name: Major Upgrade
snippets.body: <MajorUpgrade DowngradeErrorMessage="A newer version of [ProductName] is already installed." />

snippets.name: Major Upgrade with Schedule
snippets.body: <MajorUpgrade Schedule="${1|afterInstallInitialize,afterInstallValidate,afterInstallExecute,afterInstallExecuteAgain,afterInstallFinalize|}" DowngradeErrorMessage="A newer version is already installed." />

snippets.name: Major Upgrade Allow Same
snippets.body: <MajorUpgrade AllowSameVersionUpgrades="yes" DowngradeErrorMessage="A newer version is already installed." />

snippets.name: Upgrade Element
snippets.body:
<Upgrade Id="${1:PUT-UPGRADECODE-HERE}">
	<UpgradeVersion Minimum="${2:1.0.0}" Maximum="${3:99.0.0}" Property="${4:PREVIOUSVERSIONSINSTALLED}" IncludeMinimum="yes" IncludeMaximum="no" />
</Upgrade>

snippets.name: Upgrade All Versions
snippets.body:
<Upgrade Id="${1:PUT-UPGRADECODE-HERE}">
	<UpgradeVersion Property="OLDERVERSIONBEINGUPGRADED" Maximum="[ProductVersion]" IncludeMaximum="no" />
	<UpgradeVersion Property="NEWERVERSIONDETECTED" Minimum="[ProductVersion]" IncludeMinimum="no" OnlyDetect="yes" />
</Upgrade>

snippets.name: External Media
snippets.body: <Media Id="${1:1}" Cabinet="${2:product.cab}" EmbedCab="no" DiskPrompt="${3:Please insert disk 1}" />

snippets.name: Launch Condition
snippets.body: <Launch Condition="${1:Installed OR VersionNT64}" Message="${2:This application requires 64-bit Windows.}" />

snippets.name: .NET Condition
snippets.body:
<Condition Message="This application requires .NET Framework 4.8.">
	<![CDATA[Installed OR NETFRAMEWORK48]]>
</Condition>

snippets.name: Windows Version Condition
snippets.body:
<Condition Message="This application requires Windows 10 or later.">
	<![CDATA[Installed OR VersionNT >= 603]]>
</Condition>

snippets.name: Environment Variable
snippets.body: <Environment Id="${1:EnvId}" Name="${2:PATH}" Value="[INSTALLFOLDER]" Permanent="${3|no,yes|}" Part="${4|all,first,last|}" Action="${5|set,create,remove|}" System="${6|yes,no|}" />

snippets.name: Add to PATH
snippets.body: <Environment Id="PathEnv" Name="PATH" Value="[INSTALLFOLDER]" Permanent="no" Part="last" Action="set" System="yes" />

snippets.name: Create Environment Variable
snippets.body: <Environment Id="${1:EnvId}" Name="${2:MYVAR}" Value="${3:[INSTALLFOLDER]}" Permanent="no" Part="all" Action="create" System="yes" />

snippets.name: User Environment Variable
snippets.body: <Environment Id="${1:EnvId}" Name="${2:MYVAR}" Value="${3:value}" Permanent="no" Part="all" Action="set" System="no" />

snippets.name: INI File Entry
snippets.body: <IniFile Id="${1:IniId}" Name="${2:config.ini}" Directory="${3:INSTALLFOLDER}" Section="${4:Settings}" Key="${5:KeyName}" Value="${6:Value}" Action="${7|addLine,addTag,createLine,removeLine,removeTag|}" />

snippets.name: Create INI Entry
snippets.body: <IniFile Id="${1:IniId}" Name="${2:config.ini}" Directory="INSTALLFOLDER" Section="${3:Settings}" Key="${4:KeyName}" Value="${5:Value}" Action="createLine" />

snippets.name: Remove INI Entry
snippets.description: Remove INI file entry on uninstall
snippets.body: <RemoveIniFile Id="${1:RemoveIniId}" Name="${2:config.ini}" Directory="INSTALLFOLDER" Section="${3:Settings}" Key="${4:KeyName}" Action="removeLine" />

snippets.name: Text Control
snippets.body: <Control Id="${1:TextControl}" Type="Text" X="${2:20}" Y="${3:60}" Width="${4:330}" Height="${5:20}" Text="${6:Label text}" />

snippets.name: Edit Control
snippets.body: <Control Id="${1:EditControl}" Type="Edit" X="${2:20}" Y="${3:90}" Width="${4:330}" Height="${5:18}" Property="${6:EDITPROPERTY}" />

snippets.name: CheckBox Control
snippets.body: <Control Id="${1:CheckBox}" Type="CheckBox" X="${2:20}" Y="${3:120}" Width="${4:330}" Height="${5:18}" Property="${6:CHECKPROPERTY}" CheckBoxValue="1" Text="${7:Checkbox label}" />

snippets.name: PushButton Control
snippets.body:
<Control Id="${1:ButtonId}" Type="PushButton" X="${2:250}" Y="${3:220}" Width="${4:100}" Height="${5:17}" Text="${6:Button Text}">
	<Publish Event="${7:EndDialog}" Value="${8:Return}" />
</Control>

snippets.name: Next Button
snippets.body:
<Control Id="Next" Type="PushButton" X="236" Y="243" Width="56" Height="17" Default="yes" Text="!(loc.WixUINext)">
	<Publish Event="NewDialog" Value="${1:NextDialogId}" />
</Control>

snippets.name: Back Button
snippets.body:
<Control Id="Back" Type="PushButton" X="180" Y="243" Width="56" Height="17" Text="!(loc.WixUIBack)">
	<Publish Event="NewDialog" Value="${1:PrevDialogId}" />
</Control>

snippets.name: Cancel Button
snippets.body:
<Control Id="Cancel" Type="PushButton" X="304" Y="243" Width="56" Height="17" Cancel="yes" Text="!(loc.WixUICancel)">
	<Publish Event="SpawnDialog" Value="CancelDlg" />
</Control>

snippets.name: Bundle Element
snippets.body:
<Bundle Name="${1:BundleName}" Version="${2:1.0.0}" Manufacturer="${3:Company}" UpgradeCode="${4:PUT-GUID-HERE}">
	<BootstrapperApplication>
		<bal:WixStandardBootstrapperApplication LicenseUrl="" Theme="${5|hyperlinkLicense,rtfLicense|}" />
	</BootstrapperApplication>

	<Chain>
		$0
	</Chain>
</Bundle>

snippets.name: Full Bundle
snippets.body:
<Bundle Name="${1:BundleName}" Version="${2:1.0.0}" Manufacturer="${3:Company}" UpgradeCode="${4:PUT-GUID-HERE}" Copyright="${5:Copyright}" AboutUrl="${6:https://example.com}" HelpUrl="${7:https://example.com/help}">

	<BootstrapperApplication>
		<bal:WixStandardBootstrapperApplication LicenseUrl="" Theme="hyperlinkLicense" />
	</BootstrapperApplication>

	<Chain>
		$0
	</Chain>
</Bundle>

snippets.name: Full MSI Package
snippets.body:
<MsiPackage Id="${1:PackageId}" SourceFile="${2:package.msi}" Vital="yes" DisplayInternalUI="${3|yes,no|}" Compressed="yes" EnableFeatureSelection="${4|yes,no|}">
	$0
</MsiPackage>

snippets.name: Full EXE Package
snippets.body:
<ExePackage Id="${1:PackageId}" SourceFile="${2:setup.exe}" DetectCondition="${3:DetectVariable}" InstallCondition="${4:InstallCondition}" InstallCommand="${5:/S}" UninstallCommand="${6:/uninstall /S}" RepairCommand="${7:/repair /S}" Vital="yes" Permanent="no">
	<ExitCode Value="0" Behavior="success" />
	<ExitCode Value="3010" Behavior="scheduleReboot" />
</ExePackage>

snippets.name: .NET Runtime Package
snippets.body: <ExePackage Id="NetFx48" SourceFile="${1:ndp48-web.exe}" DetectCondition="NETFRAMEWORK48" InstallCommand="/q /norestart" Permanent="yes" Vital="yes" />

snippets.name: VC++ Redistributable
snippets.body: <ExePackage Id="VC14Redist" SourceFile="${1:vc_redist.x64.exe}" DetectCondition="${2:VCREDIST14}" InstallCommand="/install /quiet /norestart" Permanent="yes" Vital="yes" />

snippets.name: Remote Payload
snippets.body: <RemotePayload CertificatePublicKey="${1:...}" CertificateThumbprint="${2:...}" Description="${3:Description}" Hash="${4:...}" ProductName="${5:Product}" Size="${6:12345}" Version="${7:1.0.0}" />

snippets.name: Registry Search
snippets.body: <util:RegistrySearch Id="${1:SearchId}" Root="${2|HKLM,HKCU|}" Key="${3:Software\\Company\\Product}" Value="${4:ValueName}" Variable="${5:PropertyName}" Result="${6|exists,value|}" />

snippets.name: XML Config
snippets.body: <util:XmlConfig Id="${1:XmlId}" File="[INSTALLFOLDER]${2:web.config}" ElementPath="${3://configuration}" Name="${4:setting}" Value="${5:value}" Node="${6|element,value|}" Action="${7|create,delete|}" On="${8|install,uninstall|}" />

snippets.name: Create User
snippets.body: <util:User Id="${1:UserId}" Name="${2:username}" Password="${3:[PASSWORD]}" CreateUser="yes" RemoveOnUninstall="yes" CanNotChangePassword="yes" PasswordNeverExpires="yes" />

snippets.name: Close Application
snippets.body: <util:CloseApplication Id="${1:CloseApp}" Target="${2:app.exe}" RebootPrompt="${3|yes,no|}" CloseMessage="${4|yes,no|}" Description="${5:Please close the application}" />

snippets.name: Performance Category
snippets.body:
<util:PerformanceCategory Id="${1:PerfCatId}" Name="${2:CategoryName}" Help="${3:Category description}">
	<util:PerformanceCounter Name="${4:CounterName}" Type="${5|numberOfItems32,rateOfCountsPerSecond32,averageTimer32|}" Help="${6:Counter description}" />
</util:PerformanceCategory>

snippets.name: IIS Website
snippets.body:
<iis:WebSite Id="${1:WebSite}" Description="${2:Website Description}" Directory="${3:WebSiteDir}">
	<iis:WebAddress Id="${1:WebSite}Address" Port="${4:80}" />
</iis:WebSite>

snippets.name: IIS HTTPS Website
snippets.body:
<iis:WebSite Id="${1:WebSite}" Description="${2:Website Description}" Directory="${3:WebSiteDir}">
	<iis:WebAddress Id="${1:WebSite}Address" Port="443" Secure="yes" />
	<iis:CertificateRef Id="${4:CertificateId}" />
</iis:WebSite>

snippets.name: Firewall Exception
snippets.body: <firewall:FirewallException Id="${1:FirewallRule}" Name="${2:Rule Name}" Port="${3:8080}" Protocol="${4|tcp,udp|}" Scope="${5|any,localSubnet|}" />

snippets.name: Firewall Program Rule
snippets.body: <firewall:FirewallException Id="${1:FirewallRule}" Name="${2:Rule Name}" Program="[INSTALLFOLDER]${3:app.exe}" Protocol="tcp" Scope="any" />

snippets.name: Inbound Firewall Rule
snippets.body: <firewall:FirewallException Id="${1:FirewallRule}" Name="${2:Rule Name}" Port="${3:8080}" Protocol="tcp" Scope="any" Profile="${4|all,domain,private,public|}" />

snippets.name: HTTP URL Reservation
snippets.body:
<http:UrlReservation Id="${1:UrlResId}" Url="${2:http://+:8080/}">
	<http:UrlAce Id="${3:UrlAceId}" SecurityPrincipal="${4:NT AUTHORITY\\NETWORK SERVICE}" Rights="${5|all,delegate,register|}" />
</http:UrlReservation>

snippets.name: Complete MSI Template
snippets.body:
<Wix xmlns="http://wixtoolset.org/schemas/v4/wxs">
	<Package Name="${1:ProductName}" Manufacturer="${2:Company}" Version="${3:1.0.0}" UpgradeCode="${4:PUT-GUID-HERE}">

		<MajorUpgrade DowngradeErrorMessage="A newer version is already installed." />
		<MediaTemplate EmbedCab="yes" />

		<StandardDirectory Id="ProgramFilesFolder">
			<Directory Id="INSTALLFOLDER" Name="${1:ProductName}">
				<Component Id="MainComponent" Guid="*">
					<File Id="MainExe" Source="${5:path\\to\\app.exe}" KeyPath="yes" />
				</Component>
			</Directory>
		</StandardDirectory>

		<Feature Id="ProductFeature" Title="${1:ProductName}" Level="1">
			<ComponentRef Id="MainComponent" />
		</Feature>

	</Package>
</Wix>

snippets.name: Complete Bundle Template
snippets.body:
<Wix xmlns="http://wixtoolset.org/schemas/v4/wxs"
	xmlns:bal="http://wixtoolset.org/schemas/v4/wxs/bal">

	<Bundle Name="${1:BundleName}" Version="${2:1.0.0}" Manufacturer="${3:Company}" UpgradeCode="${4:PUT-GUID-HERE}">

		<BootstrapperApplication>
			<bal:WixStandardBootstrapperApplication LicenseUrl="" Theme="hyperlinkLicense" />
		</BootstrapperApplication>

		<Chain>
			<MsiPackage Id="MainPackage" SourceFile="${5:product.msi}" />
		</Chain>

	</Bundle>
</Wix>

snippets.name: Complete Service MSI
snippets.body:
<Wix xmlns="http://wixtoolset.org/schemas/v4/wxs">
	<Package Name="${1:ServiceName}" Manufacturer="${2:Company}" Version="${3:1.0.0}" UpgradeCode="${4:PUT-GUID-HERE}">

		<MajorUpgrade DowngradeErrorMessage="A newer version is already installed." />
		<MediaTemplate EmbedCab="yes" />

		<StandardDirectory Id="ProgramFilesFolder">
			<Directory Id="INSTALLFOLDER" Name="${1:ServiceName}">
				<Component Id="ServiceComponent" Guid="*">
					<File Id="ServiceExe" Source="${5:path\\to\\service.exe}" KeyPath="yes" />
					<ServiceInstall Id="ServiceInstall" Name="${1:ServiceName}" DisplayName="${1:ServiceName}" Start="auto" Type="ownProcess" ErrorControl="normal" />
					<ServiceControl Id="ServiceControl" Name="${1:ServiceName}" Start="install" Stop="both" Remove="uninstall" Wait="yes" />
				</Component>
			</Directory>
		</StandardDirectory>

		<Feature Id="ProductFeature" Title="${1:ServiceName}" Level="1">
			<ComponentRef Id="ServiceComponent" />
		</Feature>

	</Package>
</Wix>

snippets.name: Complete Web App MSI
snippets.body:
<Wix xmlns="http://wixtoolset.org/schemas/v4/wxs"
	xmlns:iis="http://wixtoolset.org/schemas/v4/wxs/iis">

	<Package Name="${1:WebAppName}" Manufacturer="${2:Company}" Version="${3:1.0.0}" UpgradeCode="${4:PUT-GUID-HERE}">

		<MajorUpgrade DowngradeErrorMessage="A newer version is already installed." />
		<MediaTemplate EmbedCab="yes" />

		<StandardDirectory Id="ProgramFilesFolder">
			<Directory Id="INSTALLFOLDER" Name="${1:WebAppName}">
				<Component Id="WebFiles" Guid="*">
					<File Id="WebConfig" Source="${5:web.config}" KeyPath="yes" />
				</Component>
				<Component Id="WebSiteComponent" Guid="*">
					<iis:WebAppPool Id="AppPool" Name="${1:WebAppName}" Identity="applicationPoolIdentity" ManagedRuntimeVersion="v4.0" />
					<iis:WebSite Id="WebSite" Description="${1:WebAppName}" Directory="INSTALLFOLDER">
						<iis:WebAddress Id="WebAddress" Port="${6:80}" />
						<iis:WebApplication Id="WebApp" Name="${1:WebAppName}" WebAppPool="AppPool" />
					</iis:WebSite>
				</Component>
			</Directory>
		</StandardDirectory>

		<Feature Id="ProductFeature" Title="${1:WebAppName}" Level="1">
			<ComponentRef Id="WebFiles" />
			<ComponentRef Id="WebSiteComponent" />
		</Feature>

	</Package>
</Wix>
